dir-section.heading: Tourism
dir-section.p: Slovakia’s tourist attractions include ski resorts in the Tatras and other mountain ranges, more than 20 spa resorts (with thermal and mineral springs), numerous castles and mansions, and historic towns, including Bratislava, Košice, Nitra, Bardejov and Kežmarok. The Slovak Tourist Board was abolished in 2016, and its responsibilities assumed by the Ministry of Transport, Construction and Regional Development.
